pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, November 16, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Bali, Indonesia

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Italy, Giorgia Meloni.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Japan, Fumio Kishida.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 Working Session III on digital transformation.

Closed to media

2:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 closing session.

Note for media:

  • Official media and host broadcaster coverage

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
